parameters.name: EdgeArray
parameters.description: Array of edge s associated with SketchArray

parameters.name: SketchArray
parameters.description: Array of sketch es associated with EdgeArray

title: IEdgeFlangeFeatureData.AddEdges
description: Adds edges to this edge flange.
signature:
System.Int32 AddEdges( 
   System.Object
EdgeArray
,
   System.Object
SketchArray
)

parameters.name: EdgeArray
parameters.description: Array of edge s associated with SketchArray

parameters.name: SketchArray
parameters.description: Array of sketch es associated with EdgeArray

returns: Error code as defined by swEdgeFlangeError_e
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IModelDoc2::InsertSketchForEdgeFlange
to associate the sketches with the edges.
